data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_92/100_d9b0a1d92b1c4b3643d6332fd66aa8e6.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Yve gains a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Galactic Power</font> each time she hits an enemy hero with <font color="a6aafb">Void Blast</font> or <font color="a6aafb">Void Crystal</font> (up to 10 stacks).
Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Galactic Power</font> allows Yve to launch an extra attack on the next <font color="a6aafb">Real World Manipulation</font> cast and increases the amount of shield gained by 5%.

Yve detonates Galactic Energy at the target location, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area.
Successfully hitting an enemy grants Yve 55% extra Movement Speed (halved if a non-hero enemy is hit) that decreases over 1s.

Yve summons a <font color="a6aafb">Void Crystal</font> at the target location, dealing 220<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Yve commands the Crystal to fire materialized energy in the target direction for 2.7s, dealing 105<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.45s to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. Enemies hit multiple times are slowed by an extra 6% for each hit after the first (up to 60%).

Yve creates a Starfield that lasts 15s and gains a 400<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> Shield. Within the duration, you can Tap or Swipe the screen to attack up to 15 times.
<font color="a6aafb">Tap</font>: Deals 340<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the target area.
<font color="a6aafb">Swipe</font>: Deals 65<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.45s to enemies in the target area for 2.7s and slows them by 50%.
Enemies leaving or entering the Starfield will be immobilized for 0.8s (only once against the same target).
Yve cannot be displaced while the Starfield is active, and the Starfield will remain even if Yve is controlled (except for Suppression).

data.name: Yve

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num2> extra Movement Speed and [C2Slow Immunity] for <Num1>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: CC-focused to keep enemies slowed and in range.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with skills deals <%Num1> of target's Max HP as extra [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] and restores <%Num2> Mana on hit.########[8098ab]If the hero does not use Mana, recovers <%Num4> HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to <Num5>[-].########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+300 Extra Max HP
+7% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: YATOU
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Keeper of the equilibrium of the universe.

assist.desc: Yve's works best with Tanks and Supports with strong CC to lockdown enemies for her Ultimate, like Minotaur, Gatotkaca, and Atlas.

strong.desc: Yve counters Tanks and Fighters with low mobility like Fredrinn, Barats, and Aulus due to her long range skills.

weak.desc: Yve's low survivability makes her a target for divers and burst damage heroes like Yin, Saber, and Karina.
